description: Discord client settings. Copy this file as 'app.json' and fill in the fields.

pm2-process-name.description: Name of the client process used by PM2

default-prefix.description: The default prefix used for bot commands

default-lang.description: The default fallback language for bot commands

login-token.description: The login token to your bot (keep as secret at all time!). Find this at https://discord.com/developers/applications

owner-role-id.description: Id of the guild role that has permission to use owner-only commands

owner-guild-id.description: Id of the guild where owner-only commands can be used

client-data-path.description: Path for locally saved client data
